title: How can care homes benefit from assistive technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: First let’s understand what the word assistive technology means. It can be defined as devices or systems that support a person to maintain or improve their independence, safety and wellbeing. From that point of view, it means Care Home Service Users can do more for themselves, be happier, safer and be more independent. Care Homes can also save money in the long run.
